name: Vintage Floral Sheer Dress with Pockets
description:
The Story

In total love with this sheer floral dress. Beautiful detailed print of cream and black flowers. Fits over-sized to make a great dress. Perfect for spring/summer. The skirt of the dress catches the gentle breeze quite nicely.
(belt not included)

The 411

Era: 80's
Label: n/a
Fabric: Sheer fabric
Care Tag: n/a
Condition: Excellent vintage condition

Measurements(all measurement are taken while garment is laid flat on surface):
Marked Size: n/a
Fits like M-L
Bust: 48cm
Waist: 43cm
Hips: free
Sleeves: 16cm
Length: 87cm

model wears a size small and is 5'2 115 lbs

name: Vintage Knit Button Up
description:
The Story

Up for grabs is the cute button up. The material is almost like a knit woven with stretch and cute denim collar. Perfect for any time of season. Pair with trouser pant or shorts for a "menswear" look.

Fabric: 60% Cotton/40% Polyester

description:
The Story

name: Hand Dyed Rabbit Feet
description:
The Story

Found these little treasures in Las Vegas. They are each hand dipped into colored dye. Look how vibrant they are. It's a great little accessory to add to any uptown outfit.

We only have a certain amount of these gems
Colors:
(SOLD OUT)YELLOW
(SOLD OUT)GREEN
(1)RED
(1)BLUE

The price is only for one item, if you'd like more than one please convo us!
